access_your_conversations: Access your conversations by logging in or creating an account.
name: Name
hero_description: We're not a trading platform. We're a broker connector, offering smart AI tools, signal systems, portfolio feedback, and education with tiered access.
how_it_works_desc: Our AI ecosystem operates through specialized agents. Click on a card to explore the step-by-step process for each.
arbitrage_desc: Capitalize on market inefficiencies. Our arbitrage bot scans hundreds of pairs across multiple exchanges to find and execute profitable trades in milliseconds.
agents_desc: Select an agent to connect your accounts and start leveraging our AI-powered tools.
agent_arbitrage_desc: Automatically find and execute profitable arbitrage opportunities.
mt4_page_desc: Chat with our MT4/MT5 specialist to manage your trades.
crypto_page_desc: Guided setup on WEEX and unlock Ruyaa AI signals.
